AoS - Disciples of Tzeentch 2000pts - Acolytes of the Everchosen (Age of Sigmar) [1,985pts]

        2-5 Troops

      • Core Battalion: Warlord

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Spell Lores

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Warlord


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Warlord 1-2 Commanders
        2-4 Sub-commanders
        1-2 Troops

    • Leader [1,590pts]

      • Archaon the Everchosen [830pts]

        Selections: 5. Infusion Arcanum, Aura of Tzeentch, Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, Flaming Weapon, The Slayer of Kings

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, HERO, KHORNE, MONSTER, MORTAL, NURGLE, SLAANESH, TZEENTCH, WIZARD, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, Behemoth, Leader, Coalition: STD

        Command Abilities: All-seeing Dominion, By My Will, Damage Table: Archaon1, Archaon2, Archaon3, Archaon4, Archaon5, Archaon6, Magic: Archaon, Spell: Flaming Weapon, Infusion Arcanum, Unit: Archaon, Unit Abilities: Aura of Tzeentch, Chaos Runeshield, Fly, The Armour of Morkar, The Crown of Domination, The Everchosen, The Eye of Sheerian, The Slayer of Kings, Warlord Without Equal, Warmaster, Weapon: The Slayer of Kings

        • Dorghar

          Selections: Lashing Tails, Monstrous Claws, Three Heads

          Triple-headed Monstrosity: Filth-spewer, Skull-gorger, Spell-Eater, Three-headed Titan, Weapon: Lashing Tails, Monstrous Claws, Three Heads


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        All-seeing Dominion You can use this command ability when your opponent spends a command point. If you do so, roll a dice before resolving the effects of any command ability that command point is spent on. On a 1, this command ability has no effect. On a 2+, this model can use the By My Will command ability above without a command point being spent, even if it is not the hero phase and even if that command ability has already been used in the same turn.
        By My Will You can use this command ability once per turn in the hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit on the battlefield. Until the end of the battle round, if a model from that unit is slain by an attack made with a melee weapon, that model can fight before it is removed from play.The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Archaon1 Wounds SufferedMoveThree Heads
        Archaon2 0-414"6
        Archaon3 5-812"5
        Archaon4 9-1210"4
        Archaon5 13-158"3
        Archaon6 16+6"2
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Archaon 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Flaming Weapon 4Pick 1 of the caster's melee weapons. Add 1 to Damage characteristic of that weapon until your next hero phase.
        Infusion Arcanum 5If successfully cast, add 1 to hit and wound rolls for attacks made by the caster until your next hero phase.
        Triple-headed Monstrosity Effect Ref
        Filth-spewer Pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Skull-gorger You can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.
        Spell-Eater Pick 1 endless spell within 18" of this model; that endless spell is dispelled.
        Three-headed Titan At the start of your hero phase, you can say that Dorghar will draw upon his daemonic might. If you do so, choose 1 of the following effects:
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Archaon *20103+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aura of Tzeentch You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, if this model is a general, each time a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH unit wholly within 12" of this model is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 5+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit.
        Chaos Runeshield Roll a dice each time Archaon suffers a mortal wound. On a 5 or a 6, that mortal wound is ignored.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        The Armour of Morkar Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 1-3 nothing happens. On a 4-5, that mortal wound is negated. On a 6, that mortal wound is negated and the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        The Crown of Domination Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly CHAOS units wholly within 12" of this model. In addition, subtract 2 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 12" of this model.
        The Everchosen Each time this model is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 4+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on this model.
        The Eye of Sheerian Re-roll hit rolls of 6 for attacks made by enemy units that target this model.
        The Slayer of Kings Each time this model fights, if the unmodified wound roll for 2 attacks that target the same enemy Hero with the Slayer of Kings is 6, that Hero is slain.
        Warlord Without Equal If this model is on the battlefield at the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Warmaster This unit can be included in a Blades of Khorne, Disciples of Tzeentch, Maggotkin of Nurgle or Hedonites of Slaanesh army. If it is, it is treated as a general even if it is not the model picked to be the army’s general, and you can still use the army’s allegiance abilities even if this unit is not from the army’s faction.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Lashing Tails Melee3"2D64+3+-1
        Monstrous Claws Melee1"22+3+-2D6
        The Slayer of Kings Melee1"42+3+-23
        Three Heads Melee3"*3+3+-12

      • Zahamos Dreamstave - Chaos Sorcerer Lord [115pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, CHAOS SORCERER LORD, HERO, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, WIZARD, EYE OF THE GODS, MARK OF CHAOS, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, Coalition: STD, TZEENTCH

        Magic: Chaos Sorcerer Lord, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Daemonic Power, Glimpse the Future, Mystic Shield, Shield of Fate, Unit: Chaos Sorcerer Lord, Unit Abilities: Aura of Tzeentch, Oracular Visions, Weapon: Chaos Runesword, Sorcerer Staff

        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Daemonic Power 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly MORTAL SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. You can re-roll hit and wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Glimpse the Future 7If successfully cast, you can roll a dice and add it to your Destiny Dice.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Shield of Fate 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly TZEENTCH unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Until the start of your next hero phase, that unit gains one of the following effects based on the number of your remaining Destiny Dice:
        1-3 You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target that unit.
        4-6 You can re-roll save rolls for attacks that target that unit.
        7-9 You can roll a dice each time that unit is affected by a spell or endless spell. On a 4+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit. In addition, you can re-roll save rolls for attacks that target that unit.

        Gaunt Summoner 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Infernal Flames
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Arcane Suggestion 8If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them and pick one of the following effects:
        It’s Hopeless: That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Drop Your Weapons: Subtract 1 from hit and wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Kneel: Subtract 1 from save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Bolt of Tzeentch 7If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. This spell cannot be cast more than once per turn, even though it appears in both the Lore of Fate and the Lore of Change.
        Infernal Flames 7If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them, and roll 1 dice for each model in that unit. For each 5+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is an enemy MONSTER or WAR MACHINE, roll 3 dice for each model instead.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gaunt Summoner 5586+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Book of Profane Secrets Once per battle, at the start of your hero phase, you can say that this model will use its Book of Profane Secrets. If you do so, you can summon 1 unit from the following list to the battlefield and add it to your army, but the number of spells that this model can attempt to cast in that phase is reduced by 1. The summoned unit must be set up wholly within 9" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units.

        Choose 1 unit from the following list:
        • 5 Horrors of Tzeentch
        • 10 Bloodletters
        • 10 Plaguebearers
        • 10 Daemonettes
        • 6 Furies
        Warptongue Blade If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a Warptongue Blade is 6, that attack inflicts D6 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).

        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Frantic Scribbling Each time a Wizard wholly within 18" of this model successfully casts a spell that is not unbound and that is possible for this model to cast, you can roll a dice. On a 4+, this model knows that spell for the rest of the battle.
        Scrolls of Sorcery Once in each of your hero phases, when this model attempts to cast a spell, instead of making a casting roll, you can say that it will read from its scrolls of sorcery. If you do so, roll a dice. On a 2+, that spell is automatically cast and cannot be unbound.

    • Battleline [375pts]

      • The Scions of the Apocalypse - Kairic Acolytes [125pts]

        Selections: 10 Kairic Acolytes [125pts], Cursed Blade and Arcanite Shield, 3x Cursed Glaive and Arcanite Shield, Scroll of the Dark Arts, Sorcerous Bolt, Vulcharc, Warlord - 1-2 Troops

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, TZEENTCH, KAIRIC ACOLYTES, Battleline

        Magic: Kairic Acolytes, Spell: Gestalt Sorcery, Unit: Kairic Acolytes, Unit Abilities: Arcanite Shield, Kairic Acolytes, Kairic Adept, Scroll of the Dark Arts, Vulcharc, Weapon: Cursed Blade, Cursed Glaive, Sorcerous Bolt


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Kairic Acolytes 1/1Gestalt Sorcery. It cannot attempt to cast any spells other than Gestalt Sorcery, but any number of KAIRIC ACOLYTES units can attempt to cast Gestalt Sorcery in the same hero phase.
        Spell Casting ValueDescriptionRange Ref
        Gestalt Sorcery 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly KAIRIC ACOLYTES unit wholly within 9" of the caster. Until your next hero phase, improve the Rend characteristic of that unit's Sorcerous Bolt attack by 1. A unit cannot benefit from this spell more than once per turn.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Kairic Acolytes 6"155+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcanite Shield Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a unit that has any models armed with Arcanite Shields. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated. When you allocate wounds or mortal wounds to this unit, you must allocate them to a model armed with an Arcanite Shield if it is possible to do so.
        Kairic Acolytes This unit is a Wizard while it has 9 or more models.
        Kairic Adept 1 model in this unit can be a Kairic Adept. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Scroll of the Dark Arts 1 in every 10 models in this unit can carry a Scroll of Dark Arts. A unit that includes any Scrolls of Dark Arts can add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls.
        Vulcharc 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be accompanied by a Vulcharc. If an enemy Wizard successfully casts a spell within 18" of a friendly unit that includes any Vulcharcs, roll a dice. On a 4+, that Wizard suffers 1 mortal wound after the effects of that spell have been resolved.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Tzeentch

          Selections: The Guild of Summoners

          Categories: TZEENTCH, Coalition: Beasts of Chaos, Coalition: Slaves to Darkness

          Battle Trait: Locus of Change, Masters of Destiny, Scions of the Exiled, Summon Daemons of Tzeentch, Command Abilities: The Guild of Summoners, Fate Point Summoning Table - Unit: 01. 1 Lord of Change, 02. 1 Fateskimmer, 03. 10 Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, 04. 1 Burning Chariot of Tzeentch, 05. 3 Flamers of Tzeentch, 06. 1 Changecaster, 07. 1 Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch, 08. 1 Fluxmaster, 09. 10 Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, 10. 10 Brimstone Horrors of Tzeentch, 11. 3 Screamers of Tzeentch


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Locus of Change Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target friendly TZEENTCH DAEMON units that are wholly within 12" of a friendly TZEENTCH DAEMON HERO.
        Masters of Destiny Each Destiny Dice spent only allows you to replace a single dice roll. If you want to replace a 2D6 roll (such as a casting roll or charge roll), you must spend 2 Destiny Dice. In addition, any rolls that have been replaced count as unmodified rolls and cannot be rerolled. They also cannot be modified, with the following two exceptions:

        - If you spend a Destiny Dice to replace a save roll, the result of that Destiny Dice is modified by the Rend characteristic of the attack as normal.

        - If you spend a Destiny Dice to replace a battleshock test, the result of that Destiny Dice is modified by the number of models slain from that unit as normal.
        Scions of the Exiled If your army has the GUILD OF SUMMONERS keyword, your Fate Points can only be used to summon LORD OF CHANGE units. Instead of a Fate Point cost of 30, a GUILD OF SUMMONERS LORD OF CHANGE costs 9 Fate Points to summon the first time, 18 Fate Points the second time, and 30 Fate Points each time thereafter for the rest of the battle.
        Summon Daemons of Tzeentch You can summon units of TZEENTCH DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough Fate Points. Each time a casting roll (made by friend or foe) is successful and the spell is not unbound, you receive 1 Fate Point.

        Once per turn, at the end of your movement phase, you can spend Fate Points to summon 1 unit from the list opposite to the battlefield and add it to your army.

        Each unit you summon costs a number of Fate Points as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough Fate Points to do so.

        Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly TZEENTCH HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units. Immediately after you have set up the summoned unit, subtract its cost from the total number of Fate Points you have.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        The Guild of Summoners You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly GUILD OF SUMMONERS WIZARD wholly within 9" of a friendly GUILD OF SUMMONERS HERO or wholly within 18" of a friendly GUILD OF SUMMONERS HERO that is a general. Add 1 to casting rolls for that WIZARD until the end of
        that phase. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn.

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Ghur

        Categories: Game Options

        Command Abilities: Feral Roar, Special Rules: Predators and Prey, Seismic Shift, Spell: Metamorphosis


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Feral Roar You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. The unit that receives the command must be a MONSTER. Until the end of that phase, when you look up a value on that unit's damage table, it is treated as if it has suffered 0 wounds.
        Special Rules Description Ref
        Predators and Prey Once per battle round, you score 1 additional victory point if any enemy MONSTERS were slain in that battle round.
        Seismic Shift At the start of the third battle round, after the players roll off to determine who has the first turn, the player taking the second turn in that battle round can pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield and remove it from play.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Metamorphosis 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly HERO that is not a MONSTER and that is within range and visible to the caster. That HERO gains the MONSTER keyword until your next hero phase.

      • Triumphs

        Selections: Inspired

        Categories: Game Options, Triumph

        Triumph: Inspired


        Triumph Description Ref
        Inspired Once per battle, after you pick a friendly unit to shoot or fight, you can say that it is inspired. If you do so, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until the end of that phase.

    • Malign Sorcery [20pts]

      • Endless Spell: The B﻿urning Head﻿﻿﻿ [20pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, AQSHY, THE BURNING HEAD, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon B﻿urning Head﻿﻿﻿, Unit Abilities: Flaming Skull, Fly, Predatory


        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Summon B﻿urning Head﻿﻿﻿ 76"If successfully cast, set up the endless spell wholly within range of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Flaming Skull After this endless spell has moved, if any units are within 1" of it, roll a dice for each unit within 1" of this endless spell. ON a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then, this endless spell is removed from play.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory This endless spell is a predatory endless spell. It can be moved up to 8" and can fly.
